Package org.gello.compiler

Interface Summary
NamingContext The compile-time representation of an object naming context.
 

Class Summary
BeanHelper Static method class to inspect information about Java Beans.
BeanHelper.Key A class,property key for the maps
CodeGenTreeAdapter The parse tree walker that actually generates Java source code.
CollectionInfo Type information about an object that is inferred from location to be a collection.
Compiler The public interface to the GELLO compiler.
CompileResult The result returned by Compiler.compile.
CompilerExpression The compile-time representation of a (partial) compiled GELLO expression.
CompilerTuple The compile-time representation of a GELLO Tuple type.
CompilerTuple.Part  
DumpingTreeAdapter A sable tree adapter that dumps the parse tree for debugging
JavaCompiler Implementation of VirtualCompiler which makes a system call to jikes.
JavaNameGenerator Generates unique Java names for objects.
ModelNamingContext A naming context based solely on the GELLO data model.
OperatorInfo Compile-time information about an operator.
ProgramRunner A class to execute external programs, adapted from the RSL JavaCompiler class.
StackedNamingContext A stack of naming contexts, which are consulted in top to bottom order to resolve ids.
Symbol A single symbol in the symbol table.
TableNamingContext The naming context for a symbol table, used for both the predefined symbols and the user-defined symbols.
